tags.name: account
tags.description: Operations related to accounts owned by users

tags.name: channel

get.description: Get the information of the authenticated user

delete.description: Get the information of the authenticated user

get.description: Get the public information of another user

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user

200.description: A single user with personal information removed (email and oauth service used, as well as the UUIDs of hubs they are members of, replaced with SHA256 hashes)

parameters.name: name

get.description: Search for messages in the a channel

parameters.name: hub_id
parameters.description: UUID of a hub

parameters.name: channel_id
parameters.description: UUID of a channel in the hub

parameters.name: access_account_id
parameters.description: UUID of an account that has the necessary permissions and access to the hub and channel

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: String to search for

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Maximum number of results

404.description: Resource does not exist or account does not have permission to access it

403.description: Account does not have permission to view messages in that channel

401.description: Authentication information is missing or invalid

schema.example: Authentication information is missing or invalid

get.description: Send a message in a channel

parameters.name: hub_id
parameters.description: UUID of a hub

parameters.name: channel_id
parameters.description: UUID of a channel in the hub

parameters.name: access_account_id
parameters.description: UUID of an account that has the necessary permissions and access to the hub and channel

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of messages to get

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Message to start getting messages from, if empty starts from last message sent in channel

schema.description: Array containing the number of messages requested or less if the channel did not have enough

404.description: Resource does not exist or account does not have permission to access it

403.description: Account does not have permission to view messages in that channel

401.description: Authentication information is missing or invalid

schema.example: Authentication information is missing or invalid

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Contents of the message

parameters.name: channel_id
parameters.description: UUID of a channel in the hub

parameters.name: access_account_id
parameters.description: UUID of an account that has the necessary permissions and access to the hub and channel

parameters.name: message_id
parameters.description: UUID of a message in the channel

403.description: Account does not have permission to read messages in that channel

401.description: Authentication information is missing or invalid

schema.example: Authentication information is missing or invalid

permission_setting.description: Current state of a permission for a user or a permission group

channel_permission.description: Permissions that apply only to channels

hub_permission.description: Permissions that apply everywhere in a hub

hub_permission_map.description: Map of hub permissions and their set values

channel_permission_map.description: Map of channel UUIDs to channel permissions and their set values

channel_permission_map_item.description: Channel permission and it's current setting

hub_permission_map_item.description: Hub permission and it's current setting

account.description: UUID of the account this member represents

hub.description: UUID of the hub this member is from

nickname.description: Name used by the member when in this hub

groups.description: UUIDs of the permission groups this member is part of

owner.description: UUID of the account that owns the hub

mutes.description: List of IDs of users that have been muted in the hub

bans.description: List of IDs of users that have been banned from the hub

default_group.description: UUID of the permission group assigned to new members

groups.description: Permission groups that belong to this hub

hub.description: Represents a hub in a WICRS server

id.description: UUID of the hub the group is in

permission_group.description: Represents a group of permissions that can be given to any member of a hub the hub the group is in

hub_id.description: UUID of the hub the channel is in

channel.description: Represents a channel in a WICRS server

sender.description: UUID of the account that sent the message

message.description: Message sent in a text channel

id.description: ID of the user, a hash of the email and if of the account they used to login to their chosen OAuth2 service

oauth_service.description: The name of the OAuth2 service the user used to sign up

email.description: The primary email of the account the user used for their chosen OAuth2 service

accounts.description: A list of the accounts the user owns

parent_id.description: ID of the user that owns the account

is_bot.description: Whether or not the account is dedicated to automated tasks/bot work

in_hubs.description: A list of the UUIDs of hubs the account is a member of

allowed_chars.description: Characters that are allowed to be used in the string

max_chars.description: Maximum length of the string in characters

min_chars.description: Minimum length of the string in characters

id.description: UUID of the account this member represents

times.description: How many times the message was edited

not_found.description: Resource does not exist or account does not have permission to access it

unauthorized_error.description: Authentication information is missing or invalid

schema.example: Authentication information is missing or invalid

stripped_user.description: A single user with personal information removed (email and oauth service used, as well as the UUIDs of hubs they are members of, replaced with SHA256 hashes)

stripped_account.description: A single account with the IDs of hubs replaced with hashes

string_constraints.description: Information on the constraints for a string

channel_id.name: channel_id
channel_id.description: UUID of a channel in the hub

account_id.name: account_id
account_id.description: UUID of the account to perform the operation on

access_account_id.name: access_account_id
access_account_id.description: UUID of an account that has the necessary permissions and access to the hub and channel

message_id.name: message_id
message_id.description: UUID of a message in the channel
